channel.title: Effective methods for finding afforable UI/UX Freelancers
channel.description:
Most of the posts here about UI/UX are from a couple of years ago. Thought I would post a new thread in case others have insights.
Has anyone had recent success in finding UI/UX folks from upwork or any other job posting sites?

item.title: Effective methods for finding afforable UI/UX Freelancers
item.dc:creator: rudni4ok
item.description:
What kind of the UI\UX do you need?
I can give you the designer I work with.

Read full topic
item.source: Effective methods for finding afforable UI/UX Freelancers
